reporter_caption.center: JIM HADLEY CHEVROLET-CADILLAC v. MADISON, 900 N.E.2d 88 (Ind.App. 2008)

caption.center: Jim Hadley Chevrolet-Cadillac, Inc. v. Madison Tp. Assessor.

opinion.opinion_text: Disposition of Cases by Unpublished Memorandum Decision. The Court Affirms the final determination of the Indiana Board.
